message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MA 

This paper deals with reinforcement learning in environments that are more general than (PO)MDPs, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses probabilistic assumptions and mixing conditions, which are related to information theory (cs.IT) and control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper deals with optimization of rewards, which is a topic in mathematical optimization (cs.MA).
